headline: Truist Raises its Price Target on Mohawk Industries, Inc. (MHK) to $155 and Maintains a Buy Rating
summary: Mohawk Industries, Inc. (NYSE:MHK) is among the 11 Best High Growth Consumer Stocks to Buy Right Now. On February 17, 2026, Truist analyst Keith Hughes raised the price target on Mohawk Industries, Inc. (NYSE:MHK) to $155 from $148 and maintained a Buy rating.
